Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item
  • public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Item - an item in a room in an adventure game This class is part of the Lockdown application. Lockdown is a very simple, text based adventure game. An "Item" represents one object in the game. It is represented by a name and a weight, can carry other items inside and can be open or close during the game.
    Version:
    november 2020
    Author:
    Michael KÃ¶lling, David J. Barnes, Dariana Dorin

    • Constructor Detail

      • Item

        public Item​(java.lang.String name,
            int weight)
        Creates an item with a name and a weight. At the begining the item is not opened and has nothing inside.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the item
        weight - The weight of the item

      • hasObject

        public boolean hasObject​(java.lang.String itemInside)
        Get if the item has another item inside by its name
        Parameters:
        itemInside - The name of the item we are looking for inside
        Returns:
        true if an item with that name is found or false if not

      • getObject

        public Item getObject​(java.lang.String itemInside)
        Get the item from inside by its name
        Parameters:
        itemInside - The name of the item we are looking for inside
        Returns:
        the item or null if there is no item inside with that name

      • stringInside

        public java.lang.String stringInside()
        Get a string with all the items from inside the item or a message telling that there is nothing inside
        Returns:
